fields.title: Fields
fields.description: A list of fields to return for the issue (*all by default)

fields_by_keys.title: Fields By Keys
fields_by_keys.description: Whether fields in `fields` are referenced by keys rather than IDs

expand.title: Expand
expand.description: Comma-separated list of additional information to include

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A list of properties to return for the issue (*all by default)

update_view_history.title: Update View History
update_view_history.description: Whether to mark the issue as recently viewed

fail_fast.title: Fail Fast
fail_fast.description: Whether to fail the request quickly in case of an error while loading fields for an issue
